mapper.sql: SOCIETY_FLOW, USER_FLOW, USER_NAME, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, SOCIETY_NAME, SOCIETY_DETAILED, SOCIETY_POSITION, START_YEAR, END_YEAR, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME
mapper.select:

distinct
from PDSCI.SRM_LEARNING_SOCIETY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.SRM_LEARNING_SOCIETY (SOCIETY_FLOW, USER_FLOW, USER_NAME, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, SOCIETY_NAME, SOCIETY_DETAILED, SOCIETY_POSITION, START_YEAR, END_YEAR, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME) values (#{societyFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{societyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{societyDetailed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{societyPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
